info.name: WisiPay API Production V5 (Comprehensive)
info.description: Comprehensive API documentation for WisiPay Backend v5. Organized by platform (Admin Panel vs Merchant App). Includes all management, config, and fee operations.

query.description: Start date (YYYY-MM-DD). If same as endDate, shows hourly data. If different, shows daily data (max 7 days range).
End date (YYYY-MM-DD). If omitted with startDate, defaults to today with hourly view.
Filter by specific legal entity ID
Search by Order ID or External Order ID
Maximum number of transfers to return
Sort by timestamp in reverse-chronological order

request.description: Get all transfers for a specific TigerBeetle account with enriched owner details.

query.description: Get all transfers for an owner (Merchant/PLE/LE)
Get all transfers for all owners of a type
Get direct transfers for a specific Account ID
Get manual transfers performed by specific Admin (Audit)

request.description: Smart filter that routes to appropriate TigerBeetle query based on parameters.
Response includes 'mainAccount' with id and balance.
Response includes payinAccount, payoutAccount, and expenseAccount with balances.
Response includes enriched ledger account details: payinAccount (id, balance), payoutAccount, holdAccount.
